WorkItem.Description:
HtmlTextNode's Text property and HtmlAttribute's Value property returns unresolved entities in value.
To resolve them, I may use HtmlEntity.DeEntitize, but it is not legal way. These properties must returns plain resolved values.
HtmlTextNode.Text simple returns OuterHtml, but they are not the same!
WorkItem.Summary: HtmlTextNode.Text and HtmlAttribute.Value returns unresolved entities
